name: Avoid duplicate Programs in different files (PL1)
description: This rule searches for all the PL1 Main Procedures that have the same name and are located in different files.
output:
The report lists all the duplicated PL1 Main Procedures.

It provides following information: 
- PL1 Main Procedures  full name
rationale: Duplicate main procedure names leads to confusion.
remediation: Remove one of the duplicate main procedures and review the source code.
total: Number of the PL1 Main Procedures
alternativeName: Avoid duplicate Programs in different files (PL1)
